Header.title: CALL CENTER FOR MONEY-MAKERS
Header.paragraph: Join the #1 team in weather-damage sales — and get paid like it.

About.paragraph: With over a decade in the game, we’ve become the top choice in the storm lead industry. At Marketing Storm Leads, we offer the best calling areas, a high-energy work environment, and the strongest compensation plan—base pay, commissions, bonuses, raffles, and promos that keep things exciting.

Gallery.title: Gifts, fun, and love at a local school
Posada night with the full family
Took the team to the water—again
PYes, we have our own soccer team
Not just coworkers—this is the crew

Services.name: Telemarketing Agents
Services.text: No fluff — if you can talk and hustle, you’ll eat here. Fast training, daily bonuses, real commission.

Services.name: Sales Supervisors
Services.text: Already running a squad? Bring the fire and get the tools, tech, and talent to take it further.

Services.name: Campaign Builder
Services.text: If you’ve launched campaigns, managed leads, or worked backend ops — this is your command center.

Testimonials.text: "Since day one, I felt like part of the team. The energy here is next level and the commissions really pay off."
Testimonials.name: Gibby

Testimonials.text: "Best job I’ve had. It’s fast-paced, competitive, and the bonuses are no joke. I’ve hit my goals every week."
Testimonials.name: Ramon

Testimonials.text: "They actually care about performance and reward it. I doubled my income from my last job within a month."
Testimonials.name: Israel

Testimonials.text: "Great culture, real support, and the pay is solid. If you’re hungry and speak English, this is the place"
Testimonials.name: Mike

Testimonials.text: "I came in with no experience and now I’m leading a team. Growth here is real if you want it."
Testimonials.name: Jonathan

Testimonials.text: "Daily raffles, cool prizes, and we always get paid on time. This job feels different in a good way."
Testimonials.name: JC

Team.name: Guadalajara / Zapopan
Team.job: This is where it all started. Our headquarters in Zapopan is the nerve center of our operation — a sleek, modern office where strategy meets action. We’re at the heart of Jalisco’s tech and talent scene.

Team.name: Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
Team.job: Beach vibes meet business goals. Our Vallarta team works steps away from the ocean — proving you can build something serious while living in paradise.

Team.name: Tepic, Nayarit
Team.job: Small city, big drive. Tepic is where our hustle lives. Our local office is full of sharp agents who bring the energy every day and keep the momentum strong.

Team.name: Virtual Agents
Team.job: Our remote team covers regions beyond our office hubs. We hire work-from-home agents with experience, speed, and hustle—ideal for those living farther out but ready to plug in and perform.

Features.title: 14+ Years Strong
Features.text: Dominating the game for over a decade. Built to last, built to lead, and only getting bigger.

Features.title: Top Calling Areas
Features.text: We analyze and adjust weekly, keeping you on campaigns with the best shot at success.

Features.title: On-Time Pay
Features.text: We pay weekly, without delays—because your effort deserves fast and fair rewards.

Features.title: Stable career
Features.text: Legal benefits, real raises, and daily momentum to grow a serious long-term career.
